column5: The place is close to the Airport, really convenient for travelers.  McAllister park is just around the corner. Perfect for someone that likes to walk & run while enjoying the scenery. Park offers Bike Trails, Outdoor Fitness Areas & Combined Large & Small Dog Areas.   Youâ€™ll love my place because of the neighborhood; really quiet and relaxing.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).
column8: Private Room w/Own Bathroom near Airport & Park
